snippet: The actions include giving the Agriculture Department authority to penalize retailers who traffic in food stamps and requiring the use of databases to ensure benefits go to those eligible.
abstract: Agriculture Department announces a new plan to combat food stamp fraud; measures include wider authority to penalize retailers who traffic in food stamps and a requirement that states use federal databases to ensure that food benefits go to those who are eligible.
lead_paragraph: The actions include giving the Agriculture Department authority to penalize retailers who traffic in food stamps and requiring the use of databases to ensure benefits go to those eligible.

headline.seo: U.S. Taking New Steps to Combat Food Stamp Fraud
headline.main: U.S. Taking New Steps to Combat Food Stamp Fraud
headline.print_headline: U.S. Taking New Steps To Combat Food Stamp Fraud
